video.title: The American Dollar
video.description: "The U.S. should be focused on preserving the dollar's reserve currency role. This means reducing budget and trade deficits. The budget deficit could be reduced by ending the gratuitous wars and military spending and by halting the bailouts and stimulus spending. The trade deficit could be reduced by taxing corporations according to whether the goods and services that they market to Americans are produced in the U.S. or abroad. Low tax rates if produced in the U.S. and high tax rates if produced abroad." - Paul Craig Roberts
